comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/int0lerant] Chances are it was Robert French, who was William Lawrence's head photographer. French took about 30,000 of the 40,000 Lawrence Collection images that we hold...

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: What a stunning shot?  This could have been taken in any of a dozen European countries and if you had asked me to guess I would have gone for Belgium/France.  Excellent choice NLI, it is indeed reflective and inspiring.
